00029 #include "brisaabstracteventsubscription.h"
00030 
00031 using namespace BrisaUpnp;
00032 
00033 BrisaAbstractEventSubscription::BrisaAbstractEventSubscription(
00034         const QString &sid, const QStringList &callbackUrls,
00035         const int &timeout, QObject *parent) :
00036     QObject(parent),
00037 
00038     SID(sid),
00039 
00040     CALLBACK_URLS(callbackUrls),
00041 
00042     date(QDateTime::currentDateTime()), timeout(timeout),
00043 
00044     lastSeq(0), firstMessageSent(false) {
00045 }
00046 
00047 void BrisaAbstractEventSubscription::renew(const int &newTimeout) {
00048     this->date = QDateTime::currentDateTime();
00049     this->timeout = newTimeout;
00050 }
00051 
00052 bool BrisaAbstractEventSubscription::hasExpired() const {
00053     return (timeout < 0) ? false : date.secsTo(QDateTime::currentDateTime())
00054             >= this->timeout;
00055 }
00056 
00057 quint32 BrisaAbstractEventSubscription::getNextSeq() {
00058     if (!firstMessageSent) {
00059         firstMessageSent = true;
00060         return 0;
00061     }
00062 
00063     if (this->lastSeq == 0xFFFFFFFF) /*4294967295L*/
00064         this->lastSeq = 0;
00065 
00066     return ++(this->lastSeq);
00067 }
00068 
00069 QString BrisaAbstractEventSubscription::getSid() const {
00070     return this->SID;
00071 }
00072 
00073 QStringList BrisaAbstractEventSubscription::getCallbackUrls() const {
00074     return this->CALLBACK_URLS;
00075 }
00076 
00077 QUrl BrisaAbstractEventSubscription::getUrl() {
00078     QString callback;
00079     if (!CALLBACK_URLS.empty())
00080         callback = CALLBACK_URLS[0];
00081 
00082     return QUrl(callback);
00083 }
